text: Kare-ra wa doko ni itte mo, kutsujoku o ukerudearou. Arra kara (hogo) no seiyaku o sazukaru ka, hitobito to (koshu) no meiyaku o shinai kagiri wa. Kare-ra wa arra no ikari o hi muri, hinkon ni tsukimatowa reyou. Kore wa kare-ra ga, arra no shirushi o shinjizu ni, seigi o mushi shite yogen-sha-tachi o satsugai shita tamedearu. Kore wa kare-ra ga hanko shite ho o koete ita tamedearu
